question: Shenzhen Meigao Electronic Equipment Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification

response.query: Shenzhen Meigao Electronic Equipment Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification

results.title: Shenzhen Meigao Electronic Equipment Co., Ltd
results.content: MeiGao Electronics (Shenzhen Meigao Electronic Equipment Co., Ltd.), founded in 2018, is a national high-tech and specialized new enterprise. It is an innovative technology company focusing on mini PC , industry application terminals, and IOT system solutions.
results.raw_content:
MeiGao Electronics (Shenzhen Meigao Electronic Equipment Co., Ltd.), founded in 2018, is a national high-tech and specialized new enterprise. It is an innovative technology company focusing on mini PC , industry application terminals, and IOT system solutions. The company has gained recognition from AMD Intel and is a core partner solution provider on the official website of AMD. The company has its own team of 80 R&D engineers and is committed to innovating and producing excellent products. By combining advanced technology, outstanding talents, rich experience, and quality management, MeiGao Electronics aims to provide clents with high-quality solutions, products, and services, and to offer terminal users worldwide the best quality and cost-effective products.
Meigao aims to be the best innovator, producer and supplier of mini PC. With these products, customers can experience unparalleled satisfaction and reliability, and are surprised and excited about our small but powerful mini computers.
Meigao listens to the constructive opinions of each user and understands the needs of customers. On this basis, a large number of innovations have been carried out to inject innovative ideas into every product of the company. Through these products, people really benefit from the convenience of daily life.
When we make each product, we pursue excellence through careful selection of materials. Pursue the perfection of product design. Instead of simply stacking hardware, we have done a lot of optimization and integration to achieve the best performance of the product.
Meigao is committed to providing customers with high-quality after-sales experience. We will listen to any constructive suggestions. The problems encountered in the use of the product shall be communicated in the forum. We will reply to all questions as soon as possible.

【Dual 8K Displays】NUCX series come with excellent dual display solutions with HDMI 2.1(8K@60Hz) and Thunderbolt 4 (8K@60Hz).
【NVIDIA GeForce RTX】The GeForce RTX 3000 graphics cards are powered by Ampere—NVIDIA’s 2nd gen RTX architecture. Get incredible performance with enhanced Ray Tracing Cores and Tensor Cores, new streaming multiprocessors, and high-speed G6 memory.
【Intel® Core™ i7-11800H Processor】11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor (24MB Cache, up to X GHz, 8 cores) delivers powerful and high-speed performance for uninterrupted gameplay.
【Multiple Application Options】NUCX series are ideal helper which can be widely used for home theater, office work, meeting, education, projector monitoring, host, printer, media equipment, router, etc.
【Upgrade-Friendly】Dual-channel DDR4 which supports up to 64GB，M.2 2280 PCle SSD x 1，M.2 2280 SSD Slot (Support NGFF SATA or NVMe PCIe4.0) x 1
【Multiple-System Compatibility】NUCX Series come with Win 11. Besides that, it also support Ubuntu system and Linux system, just enjoy the productivity enhancement with the choice of your desired system.
【More powerful cooling system design】We specially designed 5 heat pipes, dual smart fan and liquid metal cooling system for CPU, The excellent heat dissipation design enables the PC to maintain relatively low noise during daily operation.
【Efficient inlet & outlet 】More than 1300 heat dissipation holes to increase the air intake area 4 enlarged air outlets on the side.
【Larger heat dissipation area design】 Larger heat dissipation area design in the machine further reduces the temperature and helps the machine to exert its performance.

All the data and insights you need on DXC Technology Co in one report.
DXC Technology Co: Overview
DXC Technology Co (DXC) is an information technology (IT) and consulting services provider. The company’s service portfolio includes analytics, cloud applications, cloud infrastructure, enterprise applications, data security services, IT outsourcing (ITO), and workplace and mobility solutions. Its solutions are primarily focused on minimizing business risks and operational costs for clients. DXC caters to the insurance, healthcare and life sciences, aerospace and defense, consumer and retail, manufacturing and automotive, travel and transportation, hospitality, energy, utilities, oil and gas, technology, media and telecommunications, public, banking, and capital sectors. The company’s operations are spread across various regions including the Americas, Australia, and Europe. DXC is headquartered in Ashburn, Virginia, the US.

Future with tradition – made in Germany
Janitza LP is the North American arm of Janitza electronics GmbH, a leading German manufacturer of electrical power monitoring hardware and software. With Janitza solutions, customers can evaluate the quality of power in their facility and take action to reduce energy costs, improve uptime, and make operations more sustainable. Janitza North America LP was established in 2019 and recently opened its US headquarters in Ashburn, Virginia.
